articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: Gastrointestinal Cancers Are Surging Among Young Americans, and No One Is Quite Sure Why - Gizmodo
articles.description: More people under 50 are being diagnosed with GI cancers, with rates rising particularly rapidly in the U.S.
articles.content:
Young people appear to be increasingly vulnerable to gastrointestinal cancers, but researchers aren’t entirely sure what is driving the surge in disease.
In a new study out this week, scientists led… [+3139 chars]
